Choi Yuree

Korean: 최유리

Hometown:

Pyeongchang-gun, Gangwon-do, South Korea

Country:

South Korea

Full name:
Choi Yoo-ri
Native name:
최유리
Birthday:
Nov 24, 1998
Age:
26 years old

Introduction

Choi Yuree is a South Korean singer-songwriter and producer under Nave. She made her solo debut on February 24, 2020 with the EP "Shape".

Nave:
Mar 18, 2024-present
Shofar Entertainment:
Jan 1, 2019-Feb 23, 2024

Fun facts

1
Choi Yuree performed "A Night of Counting the Stars" (별 헤는 밤) (by Kim Dae Young) with Seo Ja Yeong during episode 4 of Mnet/tvN's survival show "Folk Us" on December 11, 2020.
…
2
Choi Yuree performed "You In My Arms" (그대 내 품에) (by Yoo Jae Ha) during episode 3 of Mnet/tvN's survival show "Folk Us" on December 4, 2020.
…
3
Choi Yuree won the grand prize at the "29th Yoo Jae Ha Music Contest" with her song "Vent / Send My Mind" (푸념) in 2018.
